summary: All three requested Doctor Suites deliverables appear implemented: a new dedicated DoctorsPage content, a /doctor-suites route plus header navigation link with active styling logic, and SEO + sitemap updates for the new route. The diff also includes several unrelated global styling/theme changes and header enhancements that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/palette overhaul including new OKLCH color tokens and orange token scale, plus forcing horizontal overflow hidden on body.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update the Doctor Suites page, routing/nav, and SEO/sitemap. Global design token changes were not requested and may affect the entire site.

hallucinated_features.description: Tailwind configuration extensions beyond what is necessary for the Doctor Suites page (e.g., container padding/screens changes, shadows, spacing, font family, orange color mapping).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; may change styling across the whole application beyond the Doctor Suites page.

hallucinated_features.description: Header redesign/enhancements including an emergency contact top bar, additional accessibility/focus styles, and a Google search URL variable.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 only requires adding a new 'Doctor Suites' navigation link and consistent active-route styling; broader header feature additions are outside scope.
